Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Power distribution unit malfunction. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Age-related degradation of elastomeric components
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Generator Control component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
d) Attributable Code: N1 - Defect confirmed but reason not established
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions.
